product_name: SunCloud Daybreak Polarized Sunglasses - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The women's SunCloud Daybreak polarized sunglasses combine serious eye protection and serious style. Polarized lenses reduce 99% of visible glare from water, snow, sand and pavement for increased visual acuity and decreased eye strain. Whiskey Stripe frames feature polarized brown lenses to eliminate glare and enhance contrast while maintaining accuracy of color transmissions. Black frames feature polarized gray lenses to eliminate glare and produce the truest transmission of natural colors. Polycarbonate lenses are 20 times more impact resistant than glass and a third the weight; they're also acid- and heat-resistant. Grilamid(R) lightweight nylon frames offer a consistent fit and flexibility at any temperature, and they are extremely impact resistant. SunCloud Daybreak polarized sunglasses feature a medium fit. Closeout.
short_description: The women's SunCloud Daybreak polarized sunglasses combine serious eye protection and serious style.
